title: Old Sci-fi mag/book covers ID
content:
Hello

Any idea what these typefaces are?

Many thanks

Tom

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024191004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/scifi_5282.JPG)
author: tomhowe

comments.content:
"New Worlds" - definitely hand-drawn.  
"OMNI" - most likely hand-drawn.  
"NEUROMANCER" - could be a font, could be hand-drawn.

- Lex
Agreed that "OMNI" was likely hand-drawn. Search any free font site and you'll find fonts based on the logo, though.
Omni was a full font used for headlines in the magazine. Check out [Saved By Zero](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024191004/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/saved-by-zero/).
